snippet.title: FDS Famicom Grand Prix: F1 Race
snippet.description:
Support Shiryu on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/Shiryu
https://www.facebook.com/ShiryuVideoGames/

With the sequel now translated to English, it is the perfect time to remind everyone that AgentOrange and MrRichard999 have also translated the original "Famicom Grand Prix: F1 Race" FDS game to English! Unlike the "F1 Race" you probably know on Game Boy, this games takes on a top down "Micro Machines" style viewpoint. It is silly addictive, a shame it was never released in the west. enjoy!

Romhacking.net Project Page: http://www.romhacking.net/translations/2839/
